snippet: A military judge said Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan’s claim — that he had carried out the shooting rampage at Fort Hood to protect Taliban leaders from American soldiers — had no merit.
abstract: Military judge effectively tosses out defense of Maj Nidal Malik Hasan, who claimed he had carried out shooting rampage at Fort Hood, Tex, to protect Taliban leaders from American soldiers.
lead_paragraph: A military judge said Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan’s claim — that he had carried out the shooting rampage at Fort Hood to protect Taliban leaders from American soldiers — had no merit.

headline.main: Judge Rejects Fort Hood Shooting Suspect’s Defense Strategy
headline.print_headline: Army Major Loses Bid On Defense In Shooting

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
